mapper.insert:
insert into sys_properties(application, profile, label, `key`, name, `value`) values
(#{item.application}, #{item.profile}, #{item.label}, #{item.key}, #{item.name}, #{item.value})
mapper.select:
select t.application, group_concat(if(t.profile is not null, t.profile, 'default')) profile from (select application, profile from sys_properties
and application like "%"#{application}"%"
group by application, profile) t group by t.application
select id, application, profile, label, `key`, name, `value` from sys_properties where application = #{application}
